channel.title: Making edgville bank safe and the rest of the outside pvp
channel.description: Title says all, if you can post me to a link or soemthing or help me that would be great.

item.title: Making edgville bank safe and the rest of the outside pvp
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“demno, post:2, topic:360673”]this is for a 508 not 317 and, i mean how would i put the coords that i want the wildy to be in the x and y right or what?

public boolean isEdgeville() {
if(absX > LOWEST_X && absX < HIGHEST_X && absY > LOWEST_Y && absY < HIGHEST_Y)
return true;
else
return false;}
}[/quote]

If you’re below 10 years of age, then I’d be nice. You’re not, you’ve done graphs in school. Just find the coordinates of the corners and input them to that method.

Read full topic
item.source: Making edgville bank safe and the rest of the outside pvp

item.title: Making edgville bank safe and the rest of the outside pvp
item.dc:creator: @demno demno
item.description:
@demno wrote:

this is for a 508 not 317 and, i mean how would i put the coords that i want the wildy to be in the x and y right or what?

public boolean isEdgeville() {
if(absX > LOWEST_X && absX < HIGHEST_X && absY > LOWEST_Y && absY < HIGHEST_Y)
return true;
else
return false;}
}

Read full topic
